backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing a layout and event log, with methods to save layouts, emit events, and query events or controls.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence metadata describing two frontend features, their related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: A map of frontend file paths to short descriptions explaining each file’s purpose within the control panel system.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus dark/light theme CSS variables and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining the root element and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component applying theming and rendering the ControlPanelScreen with a Toaster.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Ad: Modal for creating new controls with validation and dynamic fields based on control type.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Co: React context provider managing shared control layout state, syncing with the backend, and exposing CRUD operations.
Renders interactive controls (button, toggle, slider, radio) and emits signals or updates state when used, with behavior changing based on edit mode.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Cr: Provides a button to open a modal for creating new controls and passes creation and ID validation logic.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Dr: Wraps a control with draggable behavior in edit mode, updating its position during drag operations.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Im: Enables exporting the current layout to JSON and importing layouts from files with error handling.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/In: Displays and edits properties of the selected control, including ID, type, binary code, and radio options.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Mo: Toggles between edit and runtime modes with a button.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Re: Shows recently emitted signals with timestamps and provides a refresh button.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Wo: Renders the workspace canvas, placing controls with drag behavior in edit mode and showing an empty-state message when none exist.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useControlLayout.ts: Provides context accessors for managing control layout state, including CRUD operations, validation, saving, and layout import.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state, login, and logout helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/usePanelMode.ts: Manages panel mode (edit/runtime) with localStorage persistence and a toggle function.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecentSignals.ts: Fetches recent events from the backend actor with polling using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useSignalEmitter.ts: Provides a mutation to emit control signals to the backend and refresh recent events.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS styles, theme variables, dark mode rules, and custom scrollbar and control styles.
frontend/src/lib/binaryCode.ts: Validates binary strings and generates deterministic 8‑bit binary codes from seeds.
frontend/src/lib/controlDefaults.ts: Generates default configuration values for different control types.
frontend/src/lib/download.ts: Utility to download arbitrary data as a JSON file.
frontend/src/lib/layoutSerialization.ts: Validates, imports, and exports control panel layout JSON structures.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a class name merging helper using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
Renders the main control panel UI with workspace, inspector, recent signals, and import/export panels.
frontend/src/types/controlPanel.ts: Defines TypeScript types for control configurations and layout structures.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, existing features, and pending requests related to synchronizing control creation with workspace rendering.
